query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS claim_evidence_links (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  claimId VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  evidenceType ENUM('document','excerpt','dataset','observation') NOT NULL,
  evidenceId INT NOT NULL,
  relevanceScore DECIMAL(3,2),
  isPrimary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX claim_evidence_claim_idx (claimId),
  INDEX claim_evidence_evidence_idx (evidenceType, evidenceId),
  FOREIGN KEY (claimId) REFERENCES claims(id)
);

  claimId VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  evidenceType ENUM('document','excerpt','dataset','observation') NOT NULL,
  evidenceId INT NOT NULL,
  relevanceScore DECIMAL(3,2),
  isPrimary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX claim_evidence_claim_idx (claimId),
  INDEX claim_evidence_evidence_idx (evidenceType, evidenceId),
  FOREIGN KEY (claimId) REFERENCES claims(id)
);
